testsuite.name: ImmutableTest
testsuite.system-out:
--Test of set elem into Immutable matrix-- 0 0 9 4 ---- We set 1 in Row: 0 Colum: 0 1 0 9 4 Immutable@f07e0 Immutable@f07ff java.lang.RuntimeException: Index of Row and Colum must be in bound of matrix
--Test of empty Immutable matrix--
--Test of equals-- Immutable@f07e0 Immutable@f07e0 : true Immutable@f08d8 Immutable@f07e0 : false
--Test of copy Immutable matrix--
--Test of taking Row of Immutable matrix-- 4 0 8 5 ---- 4 0 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 3: Row index is incorrect
--Test of transpose-- 1 6 2 6 5 1 9 1 9 ----- 1 6 9 6 5 1 2 1 9
--Test of single matrix-- 1 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 1 java.lang.RuntimeException: Matrix should be square
--Test of taking elem of Immutable matrix-- 1 1 8 0 ---- 1 1 8 0 Elem[0;0]: 1 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Row and colum index must be in bound of matrix
--Test of copy Immutable matrix-- 2 8 5 7 ---- 2 8 5 7
--Test of self-made Immutable matrix-- Immutable@f07e0 java.lang.NegativeArraySizeException: Row or colum value cannot be less then 0
--Test of taking Colum of Immutable matrix-- 0 7 3 1 ---- 0 3 Immutable@f07e0 Immutable@f07e0 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Colum index is incorrect --Test of dimension-- 0 0 0 0 ---- Columns : 2 Rows : 2
--Test of hashCode-- Immutable@f07e0 Immutable@f07e0 : 985056 985056 Immutable@f08f7 Immutable@f07e0 : 985335 985056
--Test of fill random elem into Immutable matrix-- 3 6 5 5 Immutable@f07e0 Immutable@f083d
